ModMetaData.name: Death Stranding Faction: Porters
ModMetaData.author: HIGGS
ModMetaData.description:
This is the third strand-type mod.
Death Stranding Faction: Porters Porters are freelance delivery personnel commissioned to transport cargo to and from clients across the Rim.
Languages English
Credits: HIGGS - Art and Coding Discord Members - Coding and Emotional Support Hideo Kojima - Death Stranding
